openSourceProjects.name: web-crypto-ticker
openSourceProjects.description: A web-component for real time crypto price data. It supports multiple exchanges and pairs. Also it can be used in any web framework.

openSourceProjects.name: react-break-out
openSourceProjects.description: A simple break-out game built with react

projectsWorkedOn.name: bitmovin
projectsWorkedOn.description: HTML video player for seamless live streaming. The bitmovin player runs on every device and supports features like playback of DRM protected content and ad insertion.

projectsWorkedOn.name: hokify
projectsWorkedOn.description: A job search app for web, android and iOs. Hokify let's you apply on job instantly and frequently sends you notifications and suggestions on new jobs and offers.
